pkgmetadata.longdescription: # alt:V Masterlist for PythonYou can use this Package to interface with the alt:V master list API.# Install ```pip install altvmasterlist``` or ```pip3 install altvmasterlist```# Usage```from altvmasterlist import masterlist as altv```# DocsPlease see the Docs [here](https://nickwasused.github.io/altv-python-masterlist/).# DevelopmentYou need to have [poetry](https://python-poetry.org/docs/#installation) installed.Then install everything with ``poetry install``After that you can run the examples with ``poetry run python example_masterlist.py`` and pytest with ``poetry run pytest``
